description: Novotel Birmingham Centre offers a great location, putting you within just a 10-minute walk of International Convention Centre and Barclaycard Arena. The restaurant is the perfect spot for a bite to eat, and after visiting the fitness center for a workout, you can unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge. A sauna and a steam room are other highlights at this upscale hotel, and rooms offer MP3 docks and sofa beds.

DESCRIPTION.value: Novotel Birmingham Centre offers a great location, putting you within just a 10-minute walk of International Convention Centre and Barclaycard Arena. The restaurant is the perfect spot for a bite to eat, and after visiting the fitness center for a workout, you can unwind with a drink at the bar/lounge. A sauna and a steam room are other highlights at this upscale hotel, and rooms offer MP3 docks and sofa beds.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
In addition to a sauna, Novotel Birmingham Centre features a steam room and a fitness facility. The hotel offers a fully refurbished restaurant and bar/lounge where guests can unwind. High-speed wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge.
Event facilities measuring 2616 square feet (243 square meters) include conference/meeting rooms, small meeting rooms, and banquet facilities. This family-friendly hotel also offers access to our children’s corner including complimentary use of the X Box console, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and 24-hour room service. Limited onsite parking is available on a first-come, first-served basis (surcharge).

DINING.value: From breakfast to lunch, dinner or a tasty little snack, Novotel provides balanced choices and à la carte service 24/7 at all its hotels. At Novotel you can count on enjoying a relaxing meal in a friendly stylish setting.

RECREATION.value: Recreational amenities at the hotel include a sauna, a steam room, and a fitness facility.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Broad Street
A short walk from the the ICC, NIA, Brindley Place & The Sealife Centre. The Bullring Shopping Centre is just a 15 minute walk away. Ideally located in the heart of the entertainment quarter.

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value: • The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Breakfast fee: GBP 13.95 per person (approximately)
  • Fee for in-room wireless Internet: GBP 10 (for 24 hours, rates may vary)
  • Self parking fee: GBP 14 per day
  • Pet fee: GBP 10.00 per pet, per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.
